text: Dodiopsis solanikovi is a moth in the family Geometridae first described by Povilas Ivinskis and Aidas Saldaitis in 2001. It can be found near the Uryngym-gol River in Mongolia.Ivinskis, Povilas & Saldaitis, Aldas. (June 2001). "A new genus, Dodiopsis gen. nov., and a new species, Dodiopsis solanikovi spec, nov., from Mongolia (Lepidoptera, Arctildae)". Atalanta. 32 (1/2): 227-232. ==References== Category:Gnophini
title: Autotrichia solanikovi
